conference.trend
Class TimeTrend

java.lang.Object
  conference.trend.TimeTrend

public class TimeTrend
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a set of methods to analyze the temporal trend of a given Conference object.

Author:
Staffiero

Method Detail

getAuthorsPerYear

public java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Person> getAuthorsPerYear(int year)
                                                                        throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a set of Person. This set contains all the authors who authored a publication in the given year, considernig the given conference.

Parameters:
year - the year of interest.
Returns:
the set of authors for the given year
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getNewAuthorsPerYear

public java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Person> getNewAuthorsPerYear(int year,
                                                                                  java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Person> previousAuthors)
                                                                           throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of Person containing all the new authors for the given year. An author is a new author if he does not appear in the list previousAuthors.

Parameters:
year - the year of interest.
previousAuthors - a list of "old" authors. Each author in this list will not be included in the returned list.
Returns:
a list of new authors.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsTimeTrend

public java.util.List<statistics.AuthorsStatistics> getAuthorsTimeTrend()
                                                                 throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of AuthorsStatistics, which contains, for each year: the number of total authors, the number of new authors and the number of total authors (until the current year)

Returns:
a list AuthorsStatistics.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsTimeWindowTrend

public java.util.List<statistics.AuthorsStatistics> getAuthorsTimeWindowTrend(int firstYear,
                                                                              int lastYear)
                                                                       throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of AuthorsStatistics, within a given years range. for each year we have: the number of total authors, the number of new authors and the number of total authors (until the current year).

Parameters:
firstYear - the first year of the interval of interest.
lastYear - the last year of the interval of interest.
Returns:
null if firstYear>=LastYear, a list of authors statistics otherwise
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getPublicationsTimeWindowTrend

                                                                                        int lastYear)
                                                                                 throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of PublicationStatistics. The list contains the number of publications for each year, for a given years range.

Parameters:
firstYear - the first year of the interval of interest.
lastYear - the last year of the interval of interest.
Returns:
a list of PublicationStatistics, containing the number of publications for each year.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getGraphStatisticsByYear

public statistics.GraphStatistics getGraphStatisticsByYear(int year)
                                                    throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns informations about the co-authorship graph. The graph is built with all the authors and co-authorship relations of the given year. For each year we have informations about: the graph size, the number of connected components in the graph (connected sub-graphs), the size of the largest connected component, the size of the second largest connected component, the average clustering coefficient of the largest connected component, the characteristic path length of the largest connected component, the diameter of the largest connected component.

Parameters:
year -
Returns:
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
